<a href="https://www.grazemowing.com/?utm_source=rgagrazelandingpage&utm_medium=morningbrew_06_10" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Graze" style="width:100%;max-width: 120px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="120" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby8yMzkvMTU5Njk5NTkzNC1HcmF6ZWxvZ28ucG5nIiwiYnVja2V0IjoiY29tZXQtbW9ybmluZ2JyZXciLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ=="></a>
</th>

<tr>
<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning </strong>and special greetings to all the early risers who checked out the "ring of fire" solar eclipse at sunrise. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">If you missed it, you'll still have a chance to see the <em>total </em>eclipse of the sun on December 4...but you might want to hit Google Flights ASAP. It'll only be visible to people in the Falkland Islands, the southern tip of Africa, southeastern Australia, or Antarctica. </p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENERGY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/10/12-tortured-years-keystone-xl-pipeline-officially-canceled?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
The Keystone XL Pipeline Is Like 2020 Weddings
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/10/12-tortured-years-keystone-xl-pipeline-officially-canceled?utm_source=morning_brew" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<img alt="Keystone XL pipeline" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81MzkyL2tleXN0b25lX3hsX3BpcGVsaW5lLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Andrew Burton/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Canceled. The pipeline’s developer, TC Energy, said yesterday it was <a href="https://www.npr.org/2021/06/09/1004908006/developer-abandons-keystone-xl-pipeline-project-ending-decade-long-battle?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">pulling the plug</a> on the project after a decade-long game of tug of war over the pipeline's environmental impact.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Keystone XL wasn’t exactly an active construction site. President Biden rescinded the pipeline’s construction permit on his first day in office, reflecting his administration’s commitment to fighting climate change. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Why it matters: </strong>The announcement marks the end of a <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2021/06/09/energy/keystone-pipeline-canceled/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bitter feud</a> that pitted environmentalists, Native American tribes, and farmers against Canadian officials and the energy industry. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The former group argued the pipeline would have widespread damaging effects on the environment, increasing greenhouse gas emissions and potentially leaking oil into a critical aquifer.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Supporters of the pipeline said it would create thousands of well-paying construction jobs and bolster US energy security. </span></li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Quick backstory</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Well, not <em>that </em>quick considering the project was <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/what-is-the-keystone-xl-pipeline-and-why-did-president-biden-issue-an-executive-order-to-block-it-11611240342?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">first announced</a> all the way back in 2008. The plan was to build a pipeline carrying 830,000 barrels of crude oil daily from the oil sands of Alberta, Canada, to Nebraska, where it would link up with existing pipelines to carry it to Gulf Coast refineries.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">President Obama delayed the project, then President Trump gave it the green light, until Biden squashed it again. Alberta had spent $1.1 billion on the project, and its demise will leave a bitter taste for Canadian leaders.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>“We remain disappointed and frustrated with the circumstances surrounding the Keystone XL project, including the cancellation of the presidential permit for the pipeline’s border crossing,” Alberta Premier Jason Kenney said.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Environmentalists and others who opposed the pipeline, meanwhile, are overjoyed that their years of public advocacy paid off. “It's a great day for Mother Earth," Larry Wright Jr., chairman of Nebraska’s Ponca Tribe, said. </p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
COVID
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/09/everything-need-know-delta-covid-variant-racing-around-world?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Better Know a Covid Variant: Delta
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A variant known as Delta is gaining Covid market share in many countries and raising concerns among public health officials. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">What is Delta?</strong> It’s the artist formerly known as “the variant first discovered in India.” Last Monday, the World Health Organization <a href="https://people.com/health/who-changes-names-of-covid-variants-to-non-stigmatizing-greek-letters/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">updated</a> its naming conventions for coronavirus variants to Greek letters instead of place of origin to avoid stigmatizing countries. British scientists think Delta may be <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/covid-19-variant-first-found-in-india-is-quickly-spreading-across-globe-11623257849?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">40%–50% more transmissible</a> than Alpha (formerly B117), which is itself more transmissible than the OG strain.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Where is Delta? </strong>In at least 60 countries, most notably in the UK, where it’s replaced Alpha as the dominant strain. British officials have warned that higher case numbers could delay a full reopening for businesses slated for June 21.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Delta is also in the US, where it </span><span><a href="https://www.axios.com/fauci-uk-covid-variant-vaccines-95ecd7f5-7a77-48ed-ad20-4ac78d0c1990.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">accounts for 6%</a></span><span> of all cases. Yesterday, Dr. Fauci urged people to get vaccinated because “we don’t want to let happen in the United States what is happening currently in the UK.”</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Bottom line: </strong>Vaccines appear to be highly effective against Delta. Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/06/09/dr-scott-gottlieb-covid-delta-variant-not-immediate-threat-to-us.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">told CNBC</a> he thinks enough Americans are vaccinated for Delta to not be a threat in the US this summer.</p>

<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">

<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GEOPOLITICS
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/09/biden-repeals-replaces-trumps-app-bans?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Biden Repeals and Replaces Trump’s App Bans
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="TikTok and WeChat" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81MzkwL3Rpa3Rva19hbmRfd2VjaGF0LmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Remember the Trump-TikTok saga from last fall? When TikTok seemed to be just hours from disappearing from app stores? Well, the drama is back...kinda.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, President Biden <a href="https://apnews.com/article/tiktok-wechat-technology-biden-trump-d866cf95c7f1b802ffb88b2834117f0b?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">revoked</a> Trump’s executive orders that tried to ban TikTok and WeChat, two Chinese-owned social apps, out of concern they could be used to snoop on Americans.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Considering that you probably just came out of a TikTok hole to read this email, you know those bans never took effect. Legal challenges held them up in court.</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">So what now? </strong>The Biden administration <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2021/06/09/biden-revokes-and-replaces-trump-executive-orders-that-banned-tiktok.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">directed</a> the Commerce Department to basically do deep background checks on apps owned by foreign rivals and develop a process for determining whether they present “unacceptable national security risks.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Big picture:</strong> The trade war may have died down, but Biden is following Trump in taking a confrontational approach with China. In just the last week…</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Biden banned US investors from funding 59 Chinese companies, including tech giant Huawei.</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>The US unveiled a supply chain “</span><span><a href="https://www.reuters.com/business/biden-supply-chain-strike-force-target-china-trade-2021-06-08/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">strike force</a></span><span>” aimed at China.</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>The Senate passed a $250 billion bill that invests in American science and technology to challenge China’s growing economic ambitions.</span></li>
</ul>

<img alt="A manatee swims in a recovery pool" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC81Mzg5L3RvcHNob3QtdXMtYW5pbWFsLWVudmlyb24uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Eva Marie Uzcategui/Getty Images</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Stat</strong>: <a href="https://www.nytimes.com/2021/06/09/us/florida-manatee-deaths.html?action=click&module=In%20Other%20News&pgtype=Homepage" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">More than 10%</a> of Florida’s estimated manatee population has died since the beginning of 2021, according to the NYT. Experts say the rapid increase in deaths is due to the loss of seagrass, the manatees' food source. Pollution from agricultural and urban development running into the water has led to stronger algae blooms that smother and kill the seagrass. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Quote</strong>: “Wow, this could really be a brand. Forget Arby’s.”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">CEO of Margaritaville John Cohlan was working for an investment firm that owned a few fast food restaurants when he realized <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2021-06-09/jimmy-buffett-opens-370-million-margaritaville-in-new-york-city-s-times-square?sref=KkPzpZvz" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">how many people</a> wanted to live like Jimmy Buffet. So he switched gears and helped Buffet build a flip-flop wearing, island-time observing empire. The $370 million <a href="https://www.margaritavilleresorts.com/margaritaville-resort-times-square?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Margaritaville Resort Times Square</a> is opening next month.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Look: </strong>at everything we’ve eaten since the ’70s and see the dramatic rise of...chicken. (<a href="https://flowingdata.com/2021/06/08/seeing-how-much-we-ate-over-the-years/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Flowingdata</a>)</p>

<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
TECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/09/facebook-reportedly-planning-first-smartwatch?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Rolex? No, Just a Facebook
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/09/facebook-reportedly-planning-first-smartwatch" style="text-decoration:none;border:none;" target="_blank" class="">
<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Dumb and dumber watch" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=335 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/9u514UZd57mRhnBCEk/giphy.gif">
<![endif]-->
<!--[if !mso]>--><!-- -->
<img class="story-header-image" alt="Dumb and dumber watch" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" src="https://media.giphy.com/media/9u514UZd57mRhnBCEk/giphy.gif">
<!--<![endif]-->
</a>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Because the fried chicken sandwich market is a little too saturated, Facebook is planning to release the <a href="https://www.theverge.com/2021/6/9/22526266/facebook-smartwatch-two-cameras-heart-rate-monitor?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">next best thing</a>: a smartwatch. Yep, Facebook is prepping an Apple Watch competitor, according to The Verge. Some details:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>On the front: a display, mainly for video calls</span></li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>On the back:</span><span><strong style="color:#000"> </strong></span><span>an auto-focus camera that can be used when you take the watch off your wrist</span>
</li>
<li aria-level="1" style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Also somehow, somewhere on this watch: two detachable cameras and a heart rate monitor</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The reason for those cameras? 1) To snap and send images to Facebook and Instagram and 2) it could be part of CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s master augmented reality plan. The watches will link up with the smart glasses Facebook’s <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/16/zuckerberg-facebook-to-release-its-first-pair-of-smart-glasses-with-luxottica-.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">planning to release</a> later this year. Zuck is so bullish on high-tech glasses that he <a href="https://www.gamespot.com/articles/facebooks-zuckerberg-vr-is-the-next-major-computin/1100-6428623/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">once predicted</a> they’ll become as common as mobile phones.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Facebook’s smartwatch will reportedly launch next summer, but it’s in the early-enough stages that it still could (but probably won’t) be scrapped, per The Verge. The company has set its sales goal in the low six figures, just a poke compared to the 34 million watches Apple sold last year, per Counterpoint Research.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
GAMES
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Three Headlines and a Lie
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><em>Loki</em> arrived on Disney+ yesterday, so forgive us if we are feeling a bit mischievous. Not trick-our-brother-by-impersonating-our-dad mischievous, but enough to cause mayhem in today’s Three Headlines and a Lie. See if you can spot which one is just pretending to be a real headline:</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: lower-alpha;">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>“Biden’s press plane was about to head to Europe. Then Brood X cicadas ‘</span><span><a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/06/09/white-house-press-cicada-delay/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">invaded</a></span><span>’ the engines”</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>“French President Macron is </span><span><a href="https://www.npr.org/2021/06/08/1004368691/french-president-macron-slapped-in-the-face-during-visit-to-small-town?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">slapped in the face</a></span><span> during a visit to a small town”</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>“Washington </span><span><a href="https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2021/06/08/washington-state-joints-for-jabs-vaccine/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">announces</a></span><span> cannabis giveaway in state-approved ‘joint for jabs’ vaccine campaign”</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">

collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCanceled. The pipeline’s developer, TC Energy, said yesterday it was \u003ca href=\"https://www.npr.org/2021/06/09/1004908006/developer-abandons-keystone-xl-pipeline-project-ending-decade-long-battle?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epulling the plug\u003c/a\u003e on the project after a decade-long game of tug of war over the pipeline's environmental impact.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eKeystone XL wasn’t exactly an active construction site. President Biden rescinded the pipeline’s construction permit on his first day in office, reflecting his administration’s commitment to fighting climate change. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhy it matters: \u003c/strong\u003eThe announcement marks the end of a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2021/06/09/energy/keystone-pipeline-canceled/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebitter feud\u003c/a\u003e that pitted environmentalists, Native American tribes, and farmers against Canadian officials and the energy industry. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe former group argued the pipeline would have widespread damaging effects on the environment, increasing greenhouse gas emissions and potentially leaking oil into a critical aquifer.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSupporters of the pipeline said it would create thousands of well-paying construction jobs and bolster US energy security. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eQuick backstory\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eWell, not \u003cem\u003ethat \u003c/em\u003equick considering the project was \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/what-is-the-keystone-xl-pipeline-and-why-did-president-biden-issue-an-executive-order-to-block-it-11611240342?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003efirst announced\u003c/a\u003e all the way back in 2008. The plan was to build a pipeline carrying 830,000 barrels of crude oil daily from the oil sands of Alberta, Canada, to Nebraska, where it would link up with existing pipelines to carry it to Gulf Coast refineries.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003ePresident Obama delayed the project, then President Trump gave it the green light, until Biden squashed it again. Alberta had spent $1.1 billion on the project, and its demise will leave a bitter taste for Canadian leaders.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003e“We remain disappointed and frustrated with the circumstances surrounding the Keystone XL project, including the cancellation of the presidential permit for the pipeline’s border crossing,” Alberta Premier Jason Kenney said.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eEnvironmentalists and others who opposed the pipeline, meanwhile, are overjoyed that their years of public advocacy paid off. “It's a great day for Mother Earth,\" Larry Wright Jr., chairman of Nebraska’s Ponca Tribe, said. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" Delta\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eA variant known as Delta is gaining Covid market share in many countries and raising concerns among public health officials. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhat is Delta?\u003c/strong\u003e It’s the artist formerly known as “the variant first discovered in India.” Last Monday, the World Health Organization \u003ca href=\"https://people.com/health/who-changes-names-of-covid-variants-to-non-stigmatizing-greek-letters/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eupdated\u003c/a\u003e its naming conventions for coronavirus variants to Greek letters instead of place of origin to avoid stigmatizing countries. British scientists think Delta may be \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/covid-19-variant-first-found-in-india-is-quickly-spreading-across-globe-11623257849?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e40%–50% more transmissible\u003c/a\u003e than Alpha (formerly B117), which is itself more transmissible than the OG strain.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWhere is Delta? \u003c/strong\u003eIn at least 60 countries, most notably in the UK, where it’s replaced Alpha as the dominant strain. British officials have warned that higher case numbers could delay a full reopening for businesses slated for June 21.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eDelta is also in the US, where it \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.axios.com/fauci-uk-covid-variant-vaccines-95ecd7f5-7a77-48ed-ad20-4ac78d0c1990.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eaccounts for 6%\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e of all cases. Yesterday, Dr. Fauci urged people to get vaccinated because “we don’t want to let happen in the United States what is happening currently in the UK.”\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBottom line: \u003c/strong\u003eVaccines appear to be highly effective against Delta. Former FDA Commissioner Scott Gottlieb \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/06/09/dr-scott-gottlieb-covid-delta-variant-not-immediate-threat-to-us.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003etold CNBC\u003c/a\u003e he thinks enough Americans are vaccinated for Delta to not be a style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRemember the Trump-TikTok saga from last fall? When TikTok seemed to be just hours from disappearing from app stores? Well, the drama is back...kinda.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, President Biden \u003ca href=\"https://apnews.com/article/tiktok-wechat-technology-biden-trump-d866cf95c7f1b802ffb88b2834117f0b?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003erevoked\u003c/a\u003e Trump’s executive orders that tried to ban TikTok and WeChat, two Chinese-owned social apps, out of concern they could be used to snoop on Americans.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eConsidering that you probably just came out of a TikTok hole to read this email, you know those bans never took effect. Legal challenges held them up in court.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eSo what now? \u003c/strong\u003eThe Biden administration \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2021/06/09/biden-revokes-and-replaces-trump-executive-orders-that-banned-tiktok.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edirected\u003c/a\u003e the Commerce Department to basically do deep background checks on apps owned by foreign rivals and develop a process for determining whether they present “unacceptable national security risks.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBig picture:\u003c/strong\u003e The trade war may have died down, but Biden is following Trump in taking a confrontational approach with China. In just the last week…\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBiden banned US investors from funding 59 Chinese companies, including tech giant Huawei.\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eThe US unveiled a supply chain “\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003estrike force\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e” aimed at China.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eThe Senate passed a $250 billion bill that invests in American Experts say the rapid increase in deaths is due to the loss of seagrass, the manatees' food source. Pollution from agricultural and urban development running into the water has led to stronger algae blooms that smother and kill the seagrass. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eQuote\u003c/strong\u003e: “Wow, this could really be a brand. Forget Arby’s.”\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eCEO of Margaritaville John Cohlan was working for an investment firm that owned a few fast food restaurants when he realized \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/features/2021-06-09/jimmy-buffett-opens-370-million-margaritaville-in-new-york-city-s-times-square?sref=KkPzpZvz\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehow many people\u003c/a\u003e wanted to live like Jimmy Buffet. So he switched gears and helped Buffet build a flip-flop wearing, island-time observing empire. The $370 million \u003ca href=\"https://www.margaritavilleresorts.com/margaritaville-resort-times-square?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eMargaritaville Resort Times Square\u003c/a\u003e is opening next month.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLook: \u003c/strong\u003eat everything we’ve eaten since the ’70s and see the dramatic rise of...chicken. No, Just a Facebook\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2021/06/09/facebook-reportedly-planning-first-smartwatch\" style=\"text-decoration:none;border:none;\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"\"\u003e\n\u003c!--[if mso]\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Dumb and dumber watch\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" height=335 src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/9u514UZd57mRhnBCEk/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso]\u003e--\u003e\u003c!-- --\u003e\n\u003cimg class=\"story-header-image\" alt=\"Dumb and dumber watch\" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" src=\"https://media.giphy.com/media/9u514UZd57mRhnBCEk/giphy.gif\"\u003e\n\u003c!--\u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eGiphy\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eBecause the fried chicken sandwich market is a little too saturated, Facebook is planning to release the \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/2021/6/9/22526266/facebook-smartwatch-two-cameras-heart-rate-monitor?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003enext best thing\u003c/a\u003e: a smartwatch. Yep, Facebook is prepping an Apple Watch competitor, according to The Verge. Some details:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOn the front: a display, mainly for video calls\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eOn the back:\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003e \u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003ean auto-focus camera that can be used when you take the watch off your wrist\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli aria-level=\"1\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eAlso somehow, somewhere on this watch: two detachable cameras and a heart rate monitor\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe reason for those cameras? 1) To snap and send images to Facebook and Instagram and 2) it could be part of CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s master augmented reality plan. The watches will link up with the smart glasses Facebook’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/09/16/zuckerberg-facebook-to-release-its-first-pair-of-smart-glasses-with-luxottica-.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eplanning to release\u003c/a\u003e later this year. Zuck is so bullish on high-tech glasses that he \u003ca href=\"https://www.gamespot.com/articles/facebooks-zuckerberg-vr-is-the-next-major-computin/1100-6428623/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eonce predicted\u003c/a\u003e they’ll become as common as mobile phones.\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eFacebook’s smartwatch will reportedly launch next summer, but it’s in the early-enough stages that it still could (but probably won’t) be scrapped, per The Verge. The company has set its sales goal in the low six figures, just a poke compared to the 34 million watches Apple sold last year, per Counterpoint Research.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS
